text:
If I put a property tag into the xml build file and tell it to load from a file
that doesn't exist, no warning is issued.

If this is desired behaviour, it should at least be documented in the manual.
creator: ben_walding@yahoo.com

text:
It is currently logged at verbose level. I guess we could change that to INFO
That would make sense.
creator: conor@apache.org
conor@apache.org
text: Raised the logging level to WARN

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
I'm changing this back to VERBOSE since it is common practice to attempt to 
load property files which don't exist. Ant's own build file does this. It is 
used to override property values contained in the build file.

Having these come out as messages in the build is somewhat annoying and I have 
changed the level back accordingly.
